p-1: The weekly State Pension amount will go {{CHANGE}} from {{FROM}} to {{TO}} from {{DATE}}.
p-2: A new award letter will be sent to the claimant.
p-arrears: An arrears payment of {{AMOUNT}} will be made for the period {{FROM}} to {{TO}}.
p-uprating: From {{DATE}} the award changes to {{AMOUNT}} due to annual uprating.
